step_data.thought: I'm currently on the Reports section and have already explored the Orders Report (sales) and Bestsellers Report (products). According to the goal, I should also look at customer reports. Looking at the dropdown menu that's currently open, I can see the 'Customers' section with options like 'Order Total', 'Order Count', and 'New'. Let me click on one of these to view customer statistics, for example 'Order Total' which would show me customer data organized by order totals.
